Description: Fragment with profile of Attic black-glazed pottery bowl. Wholly glazed; rouletting preserved on floor, centre lost. Thickened incurving rim; shallow, broad groove on resting surface. Incised inscription on wall.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 610)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1820)
